discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
It is self-service environment. The correct answer is C. 
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/fin-ops-core/dev-itpro/database/dbmovement-scenario-goldenconfig#self-service

Selected Answer: C
as per below comments

comments.content: C seems correct. Please ignore this.

discussion.content: Refreshing the database from Lifecycle Services (LCS) is typically used for updating the UAT environment with the latest changes from the production environment, rather than moving data to production. It's a way to synchronize the UAT environment with production without overwriting any customizations or data that have been added in UAT. Therefore, for moving UAT configuration and master data to production, importing the database from LCS is the appropriate action. Answer should be A

Selected Answer: C
C because it’s self service. And in case of “MS managed”, to me it would have been B

Selected Answer: D
D. Create a service request for the environment deployment.

comments.content:
Self-service is required here...it is C

https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/fin-ops-core/dev-itpro/database/dbmovement-scenario-goldenconfig#self-service

choices.C: Refresh the database from Lifecycle Services (LCS).
choices.D: Create a service request for the environment deployment.
choices.B: Create a service request to move the sandbox environment to the production environment.
choices.A: Import the database from Lifecycle Services (LCS).

questions.question_text:
A company is implementing Dynamics 365 Finance. The company plans to implement a self-service environment.

The golden configuration and master data have been copied to the user acceptance testing (UAT) environment. The company is ready for a cutover.

You need to move the UAT configuration and master data to the production environment.

What should you do?

discussion.content:
1) Team member
https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=866544&clcid=0x409

"The Dynamics 365 Team Members user license also grants a named user the following rights for Finance, Supply Chain, Commerce, Human Resources, and Project Operations. Again, these rights are for their own use,
or for limited HR use by managers, and not for activities for, or on behalf of, others.
• Record any type of time or expense (!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!)
• Approve time, expenses, and invoices 
• Create requisitions
• Create or edit items related to quality control and departmental budgets
• Manage their own employee information
• Manage human resources activities for direct employees or those reporting up through the user’s
reporting chain
• Use Human Resources Self Service functionality (when Human Resources is licensed by the
organization)"


2) Finance

https://www.encorebusiness.com/blog/d365-finance-and-operations-license-pricing/
"A team member license is the most affordable and the most limited. It gives a user full read access to Finance & Operations data, plus data from D365 CRM apps like Sales. Team members can also use specific D365 functions like expense entry or contact updates. "

Seems to be Finance both. Team members are only allowed to process budgets and positive pay in Finance. https://download.microsoft.com/download/9/6/7/96706B15-1CBE-47B7-AB9E-6BC31A377BBB/Dynamics%20365%20Licensing%20Guide%20-%20September%202023.pdf

comments.content:
expense creator is not a big action.

the answer is correct

discussion.content:
Both finance.

Team licence looks like an only read license.

https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/get-started/team-members-license

questions.question_text:
HOTSPOT
-

A company is evaluating licensing for Dynamics 365 Finance.

The company requires expense management functionality that enables expense reports to be submitted by various users. Expense approvals will be a back-office function.

You need to determine the license type for each role.

Which license types are required? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: E
E: Tier 5 is correct

questions.question_text:
A company is implementing a Dynamics 365 environment.
The environment will be used for performance testing. Performance tests will occur at 40,000 transaction lines per hour and will include 200 users. The environment must minimize cost.
You need to determine which tier of environment is required.
What should you recommend?

DRAG DROP
-

A professional services company plans to implement Dynamics 365 Finance.

You need to recommend a licensing strategy for the following users:

//IMG//


What should you recommend? To answer, drag the appropriate licenses to the correct users. Each license may be used once, more than once, or not at all. You may need to drag the split bar between panes or scroll to view content.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//

discussion.content:
I would go with 
User 1 = Base
User 2 Base
As both Enterprise Finance users that fits into D365 Finance

I just checked the licensing guide - Cost Accountant is SCM so its:

1. Base and Attach 
2. Base
Every thing looks like it fits within D365 Finance license so answers are: Base, Base. Link: https://www.avantiico.com/overview-of-microsoft-dynamics-365-licensing-march-2021/
